welcome_to_sendy:
Welcome to Sendy! Before you get started here are the terms and conditions for
using our service. It is important to us that both partners(you) and customers
have the best possible experience
by_checking_on_boxes:
By checking on the boxes you acknowledge you have
read and agree with the following terms:
states_driver_responsibility: This states the driver responsibilities, Payment terms and penalties
sign_to_acknowledge: Sign to acknowledge that you have read, understood and accepted the partner terms and conditions for the use of Sendy
error_uploading_photo: There was an error uploading your photo: {message}
